Description Agent Intervention : Oral Valganciclovir hydrochloride : 2- [ ( 2-amino-6-oxo-6,9-dihydro-3H-purin-9-yl ) methoxy ] -3-hydroxypropyl ( 2S ) -2-amino-3-methylbutanoate . Currently market Valcyte Â® .
